Olivia Knoedt

Olivia Knoedt

I'm Olivia, a software engineering lead currently based in London. I'm currently Head of Engineering at OpenSC, working towards verifying low-carbon and sustainable food production within supply chains using data, automation and innovative technology.

I'm interested in:
  • Diversity in tech
  • Climate, sustainability & tech for good
  • Leadership & people
